name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Chat GPT On Any Website - Inline AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use GPT for running a quick prompt, fixing grammar, translating text, all with a simple click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the power of free Chat GPT on every website with Inline AI. This versatile Chrome extension allows you to enhance your writing by just running a quick prompt, fixing grammar, translating text, all with simple clicks.

## Features:

★ Custom Prompts
★ Open AI Chat GPT support
★ Lifetime License
★ 1 Free AI model

## How to Use:

★ Step 1: Select Text
Select and Right-click on the text you want to process. Select Process with Inline AI menu.

★ Step 2: Choose Prompt
You can choose any prompt that you want to use to process the selected text. You can also choose the response length from small, medium, and large.

Elevate your writing and communication with Inline AI. Download now and unlock the full potential of AI in your browser!
